name: Waifu Club - Ayame
description:
Waifu Club is a very addicting puzzle game in which you must solve puzzles of the lovey Ayame.
Every awesome puzzle has 40 tiles.

The game has an amazing soundtrack, 6 levels of the beautiful Ayame in HD Quality.
This said the game is a perfect way to relax from a hard day at work.

Features

  • 6 levels of beautiful girls
  • Relaxing music and gameplay
  • all images in high HD quality
  • makes you forgot all your sorrows

Game Modes

  • Puzzle Mode
  • Gallery Mode
